channel.title: docker on Yehh
channel.description: Recent content in docker on Yehh

item.title: docker-images
item.description: 几个概念 rootfs 在linux的视角下，这是指第一个挂载的文件系统，这个文件系统是基于内存的，而且其包括了/Sbin /etc等重要目录,在挂载后其会

item.title: docker-dockerfile
item.description: Dockerfile 最佳实践 分段构建 FROM golang AS build-env ADD . /go/src/app WORKDIR /go/src/app RUN go get -u -v github.com/kardianos/govendor RUN govendor sync RUN GOOS=linux GOARCH=386 go build -v -o /go/src/app/app-server FROM alpine RUN apk add -U tzdata RUN ln -sf /usr/share/zoneinfo/Asia/Shanghai /etc/localtime COPY --from=build-env /go/src/app/app-server /usr/local/bin/app-server EXPOSE 8080 CMD [ "app-server" ]
